markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=1576) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 45, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Enhanced Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=318)

</column>

---

Your familiar is imbued with even more magic than other familiars. You can select a base of six familiar or master abilities each day, instead of four.

**Special** [Witch] Add the bonus familiar abilities you gain for being a witch to this amount.
name: Incredible Familiar
